pages.text: Spectral Glass is a magical block imbued with souls that reacts sensitively to the effects of the sun and moon. Sometimes the blocks feel passable and sometimes not, a difference like night and day!

The state of the glass is volatile and can be changed by the touch of an athame to adapt its behavior to the reaper's needs.$(br2)Alternatively you can also do this by simply placing the glass on any crafting grid.
Passable during the day, solid during the night.
Solid during the day, passable during the night.
